00060 double RadCalcer::Getkmax() const
00061 {
00062   double kmax;
00063   switch (_switchkmax)
00064   {
00065     case 1:
00066       // Ivan's first version of k_max
00067       kmax = _x*_en;
00068     break;
00069 
00070     case 2:
00071       // Another version from Ivan's code
00072       _x <= 0.5 ? kmax = _x*_en : kmax = (1.-_x)*_en;
00073     break;
00074 
00075     case 3:
00076       // Magdalena's favourite version of k_max
00077       kmax = 2.*_x*(1.-_x)*_en;
00078     break;
00079 
00080     default:
00081       kmax = -1.;
00082       break;
00083   }
00084   return kmax;
00085 }
